subject: Hockey, Ice
News and News Media
Blogs and Blogging (Internet)
Newspapers
lead_paragraph: The Islanders financed a blog last season that focused on the team but had editorial independence. But the future of Islanders Point Blank is now uncertain.
snippet: The Islanders financed a blog last season that focused on the team but had editorial independence. But the future of Islanders Point Blank is now uncertain.
